item.title: Wall Street Goes Blockchain With Factom, Intrinio - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Wall Street Goes Blockchain With Factom, Intrinio - Bitcoin News

Blockchain-based data management platform, Also read: Dept of Homeland Security Awards $200K to Factom for ID System has announced its partnership with an application and financial data provider. The duo plans on putting Wall Street on the Factom blockchain to provide immutable and transparent US stock market data for the first time in history.

item.title: Who will play the role of miners (or nodes) in non-financial blockchain and how they get benefitted?
item.description:
Who will play the role of miners (or nodes) in non-financial blockchain and how they get benefitted?

Answer: Miners and Nodes in a blockchain are not a Who question, but a what question. A better way of thinking about mining nodes & the software is to compare them to something like a network firewall software on your modem. All they do is run on the devices.

item.title: Moscow Government to Explore Blockchain Voting - CoinDesk
item.description:
Moscow Government to Explore Blockchain Voting - CoinDesk

Government officials in Moscow today revealed plans to investigate applications of blockchain technology. According to a report by , Deputy Head of the Department of Information Technologies (DIT) of Moscow Andrey Belozerov said that the agency is exploring how to apply blockchain to various use cases, including voting fraud.

item.title: DECENT Software Sale Major Update Announced
item.description:
DECENT Software Sale Major Update Announced

With just a couple of weeks left to go until the DECENT Software Sale starts, DECENT Content Distribution Platform announced its decision to adjust token distribution and the overall amount of tokens to be issued. According to the DECENT team, while the decision is a strategic one, it was made after taking into consideration "many suggestions from the community" as well.

item.title: Iconomi ICO Starts Tomorrow: Blockchain Investment Fund Management Platform
item.description:
Iconomi ICO Starts Tomorrow: Blockchain Investment Fund Management Platform

Iconomi, a platform where users can easily buy and sell Ether with Euros is expanding its services and creating a fund management platform that allows users to profit from the "emerging blockchain and crowdfunding-based economic movement". Iconomi is run by the Cashila exchange, which provides a fast and secure way to purchase Bitcoins for European customers.

item.title: Bitcoin IRA Offering 1% Silver Rebates to New Clients
item.description:
Bitcoin IRA Offering 1% Silver Rebates to New Clients

Bitcoin IRA, as the company is aptly titled, is now providing a 1% silver rebate to all new IRA account holders. A Californian Bitcoin startup aiming to protect senior citizens' retirement savings from market turmoils has announced a special offer.
